DiscussionSteps.prompt:
Analyze the user's input about the project and provide information in JSON format. ProjectGoal must be focused on user's needs, short but concise, and must be an imperative sentence. Response must contain the most important project data. Ensure that the output follows the JSON structure {"ProjectName": "", "ProjectGoal": "", "Description": "", "Purpose": "", "Expected output": "", "Objectives": [ "" ], "Functionalities": [ "" ], "Constraints": { "Resources": [ "" ], "Technology": [ "" ], "Best Practices": [ "" ], "Other": [ "" ]}}
Fill in any missing information to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "essential_components": {    "system_architecture": {      "description": "",      "considerations": [        "",        ""      ]    },    "data_management": {      "description": "",      "considerations": [        "",        ""      ]    },    "user_interface_elements": {      "description": "",      "considerations": [        "",        ""      ]    },    "external_integrations": {      "description": "",      "considerations": [        "",        ""      ]    }  }}, provide me with information about identify the essential components necessary for realizing the project's objectives. Consider factors such as system architecture, data management, user interface elements, and external integrations. MUST fill in any missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "constraints_analysis": {    "resources": {      "limitations": [        "",        ""      ],      "assumptions": [        "",        ""      ]    },    "technology": {      "dependencies": [        "",        ""      ],      "assumptions": [        "",        ""      ]    },    "regulations": {      "compliance needs": [        "",        ""      ],      "assumptions": [        "",        ""      ]    },    "scalability": {      "considerations": [        "",        ""      ],      "assumptions": [        "",        ""      ]    }  }}, provide me with information about analyze potential constraints and assumptions implicit in the project requirements. Consider aspects such as resource limitations, technological dependencies, regulatory compliance, and scalability considerations. MUST fill in any missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "description": "",  "architectural_design": {    "design_principles": [      "",      "",      ""    ],    "components": [      {        "name": "",        "description": "",        "technologies": ["", ""]      },      {        "name": "",        "description": "",        "technologies": [""]      }    ],    "interactions": {      ""    }  },  "functionality": {    "core_features": [      "",      ""    ],    "user_stories": [      "",      ""    ]  },  "scalability": {    "strategies": [      "",      ""    ],    "limitations": ""  },  "data_flow": {    "sources": ["", ""],    "processing": "",    "destinations": ["", ""]  }}, provide me with information about craft a detailed blueprint outlining the architectural design and functionality of the project. Incorporate design principles, scalability strategies, data flow mechanisms, and any other relevant details. MUST fill in any missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "translation_process": {    "design_blueprint_analysis": {      "tools": ["", ""],      "deliverables": ["", ""]    },    "feature_implementation": {      "development_practices": [        "",        ""      ],      "coding_standards": {        "language": "",        "style_guide": ""      }    }  }}, provide me with information about translate the design blueprint into tangible project features. Utilize development best practices, and coding standards to ensure efficient development. MUST fill in any missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "testing_procedures": {    "testing_levels": [      {        "level": "",        "description": ""      },      {        "level": "",        "description": ""      },      {        "level": "",        "description": ""      }    ],    "additional_testing": [      "",      ""    ]  }}, provide me with information about conduct comprehensive testing procedures to validate the functionality, performance, and reliability of the project. Include unit tests, integration tests, acceptance tests, and any other relevant testing methodologies. MUST fill in any missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "purpose": "",  "architecture": {    "overview": "",    "diagrams": [""],    "details": ""  },  "functionality": {    "core_features": [      "",      ""    ],    "user_guide": {      "getting_started": "",      "using_features": "",      "tutorials": [""]    }  },  "troubleshooting": {    "common_issues": [      "",      ""    ],    "reporting_bugs": ""  },  "maintenance": {    "development_process": "",    "contribution_guidelines": ""  }}, provide me with information about document the project comprehensively, including its purpose, architecture, functionality, usage instructions, and troubleshooting guidelines. Ensure the documentation facilitates understanding and maintenance of the project. MUST fill in any missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "review_process": {    "compliance_assessment": {      "standards": ["", ""],      "metrics": ["", ""],      "findings": {        "compliant": [""],        "non-compliant": [""]      }    },    "reviewer_opinion": {      "strengths": [""],      "weaknesses": [""],      "recommendations": [""]    },    "analytics_tools": ["", ""],    "improvement_plan": {      "based_on": [""],      "actions": ["", ""]    }  }}, provide me with information about conduct a detailed review to assess the project's compliance with quality requirements and standards. Give your opinion, conduct a review, and use familiar analytics tools to improve. MUST fill in the missing information necessary to complete the task.

In JSON format {  "ProjectName": "",  "delivery_package": {    "documentation": {      "format": "",      "location": ""    },    "release_notes": {      "content": "",      "location": ""    },    "deployment_instructions": {      "target_environment": "",      "instructions": "",      "location": ""    },}}, provide me with information about deliver the finalized design package. Include documentation, release notes, and deployment instructions. MUST fill in the missing information necessary to complete the task.
